overview: These nerdy girls are anything but innocent in this hardcore tribute to gals in glasses! They're horny and wet, just waiting for a good old-fashioned fuck fest to steam up their lenses! They're not going to be satisfied filling just one hole - they want those big cocks to fuck their faces, pussies and asses - and all while they're wearing glasses! It's the Hustler 'spectacle' fans won't want to miss - where 'four-eyed' honeys get exactly what they crave!
title: 4 Eyes, 3 Holes
